concept.title: Additional Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom configuration properties to MapR Streams Consumer. You can use any MapR or Kafka property supported by MapR Streams. For more information, see the MapR Streams documentation.

conbody.p: additional propertiesMapR Streams ConsumerMapR Streams Consumer originadditional propertiesYou can add any valid configuration property. When you add a property, enter the exact property name and the value. MapR Streams Consumer does not validate the property names or values.
